tkinter_gui module¶

School Management System GUI Application

This module provides a comprehensive Tkinter-based graphical user interface for managing school records, including students, instructors, and courses.

module:

gui

class tkinter_gui.SchoolManagementSystemGui[source]¶

Bases: Tk

Main application class for the School Management System GUI.

This class inherits from tk.Tk and provides a GUI interface for managing school-related data, including students, instructors, and courses.

db¶

Database connection and management object

Type:

DatabaseManager

notebook¶

Tabbed interface for different management sections

Type:

ttk.Notebook

add_course()[source]¶

Add a new course to the database.

Validates input fields and adds course record. Displays success or error messages.

Raises:

  • ValueError – If required fields are missing or invalid

  • Exception – For database-related errors

add_instructor()[source]¶

Add a new instructor to the database.

Validates input fields, adds instructor record, and assigns selected courses. Displays success or error messages.

Raises:

  • ValueError – If required fields are missing or invalid

  • Exception – For database-related errors

add_student()[source]¶

Add a new student to the database.

Validates input fields, adds student record, and registers selected courses. Displays success or error messages.

Raises:

  • ValueError – If required fields are missing or invalid

  • Exception – For database-related errors

backup_database()[source]¶

Create a backup of the school management database.

Provides a file dialog for selecting backup location and copies the database file to the chosen path.

clear_form(fields)[source]¶

Clear input fields after successful record addition.

Parameters:

fields (list) – List of input fields to be cleared

create_course_tab()[source]¶

Create the course management tab in the application.

Sets up input fields and controls for adding new courses, including course name and course ID.

create_instructor_tab()[source]¶

Create the instructor management tab in the application.

Sets up input fields and controls for adding new instructors, including name, age, email, ID, and course assignment.

create_school_tab()[source]¶

Create the school records tab in the application.

Sets up a treeview for displaying school records and provides search, edit, and delete functionalities.

create_student_tab()[source]¶

Create the student management tab in the application.

Sets up input fields and controls for adding new students, including name, age, email, ID, and course registration.

delete_data()[source]¶

Delete a selected record from the school records.

Provides confirmation dialog and deletes the selected student, instructor, or course from the database.

edit_data()[source]¶

Edit a selected record from the school records.

Provides edit dialogs for students, instructors, and courses with validation and update functionality.

get_course_names()[source]¶

Retrieve a list of course names from the database.

Returns:

A list of course names

Return type:

list

load_data()[source]¶

Load and display current school records in the treeview.

Retrieves students, instructors, and courses from the database and populates the school records tab.

refresh_course_list()[source]¶

Refresh the course lists in student and instructor tabs.

Clears and repopulates course selection listboxes with the latest courses from the database.

search_data()[source]¶

Search and display records based on user input.

Performs a case-insensitive search across school records and displays matching results in a popup window.
